name: LightningMovieRound
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lightning movie round
Developer Terms of Use
des: Lightning Movie Round skill is created to put your movie knowledge to test with this fantastic questions in the set of hints. Start with invocation name just say "start Lightning Movie Round" and then start game by saying "start game" to start. First hint will be given if you know the answer you can say the "movie name" or for next hint just say "tell me next hint". 3 hints will be given to player. If player fails to answer then after hints are over then answer will be said. To end game simply say "end game".
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
